static int s_tag_assigner = 0

Detailed Description

Definitions for PPU-initiated DMA transfer helpers.

Note:
The helpers declared in this file do not provide any alignment support; the caller should take care of alignment both for the transfer size and addresses.

Currently for libspe and libspe2 it requires privileged access (i.e., root access)

Transfer direction might be confusing; note that GET means "GET from SPU" and PUT means "PUT from PPU".

Define Documentation

 
#define ctk_dma_new_tag (  )     (s_tag_assigner = (s_tag_assigner & 0xf), s_tag_assigner++)

ctk_dma_new_tag: get a new DMA tag

Returns:
a new tag group ID

Function Documentation

int ctk_dma_get ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
ls_addr_t  ls_addr,
void *  ea_addr,
dma_size_t  size,
int  tag 
)

ctk_dma_get: DMA get operation (from EA to LS)

Parameters:
[in] spe - target or source SPE
[in] ls_addr - destination LS addr (must be 16-byte aligned)
[in] ea_addr - source EA addr (must be 16-byte aligned)
[in] size - transfer size (must be 16-byte aligned)
[in] tag - DMA tag to associate the initiating transfer
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno (non-zero) otherwise

ls_addr_t  ls_addr,
void *  ea_addr,
dma_size_t  size 
) [inline, static]

ctk_dma_put_block: blocking DMA put operation (from EA to LS). This routine won't return until the DMA transfer finishes.

Parameters:
[in] spe - target or source SPE
[in] ls_addr - destination LS addr (must be 16-byte aligned)
[in] ea_addr - source EA addr (must be 16-byte aligned)
[in] size - transfer size (must be 16-byte aligned)
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno (non-zero) on failure

int ctk_dma_read_tag_status ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
int  tag_mask 
)

ctk_dma_read_tag_status: Checks the status of DMA transfers specified by the given tag_mask.

See also:
ctk_dma_wait_all, ctk_dma_wait_any
Parameters:
[in] spe - target or source SPE
[in] tag_mask - DMA tag(s) mask to be checked.
Returns:
non-zero (>0) if ANY of requested DMA transfers specified by tag_mask completes, 0 otherwise. Returns -errno (<0) value on error.

static int ctk_dma_wait ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
int  tag 
) [inline, static]

ctk_dma_wait: blocks until the DMA transfer specified by the given tag has done.

Parameters:
[in] spe - target or source SPE
[in] tag - DMA tag to be waited.
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno (non zero) on failure

int ctk_dma_wait_all ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
int  tag_mask 
)

ctk_dma_wait_all: blocks until all of the DMA transfers specified by the given tag_mask have done. Tag masks can be constructed by calling macros CTK_DMA_TAG_SET and CTK_DMA_TAG_CLR.

Parameters:
[in] spe - target or source SPE
[in] tag_mask - DMA tag(s) mask to be waited.
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno (non zero) on failure

int ctk_dma_wait_any ( ctk_spe_t  spe,
int  tag_mask 
)

ctk_dma_wait_any: blocks until ANY of the DMA transfers specified by the given tag_mask have done.

See also:
ctk_dma_wait_all, ctk_dma_read_tag_status
Parameters:
[in] spe - target or source SPE
[in] tag_mask - DMA tag(s) mask to be waited.
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno (non zero) on failure
